description: Recruitment and hiring workflows, particularly focused on social media and remote hiring processes

workflows.workflow_name: Communicate with Remote Candidates via Instagram DMs
workflows.objective: Facilitate comprehensive communication with job candidates through Instagram DMs, covering all stages from vacancy confirmation to interview scheduling and follow-up

steps.description: Verify vacancy interest - Begin by confirming the specific vacancy the candidate is interested in and provide an overview of the role
Inquire about language skills - Ask candidates about their language skills, specifying the level of proficiency needed for the role
Check interview timing preferences and confirm final interview time - Discuss potential interview timings, offer alternatives, confirm appointment and provide virtual interview link
Handle rescheduling requests - If candidate requests a change, negotiate a new interview time that suits both parties and ensure timely updates to all involved

steps.step_name: Provide Pre-Interview Information for Job Requests
steps.description: Send pre-interview instructions - Address candidate questions regarding interview preparation, provide specific instructions on expected topics or general format

steps.step_name: Follow Up on Candidate Profiles for Job Applications
steps.description: Request resume submission - Ask candidate to submit resume via alternate platform (Telegram) if not provided yet, confirm receipt before interview
steps.format: File transfer via Telegram, confirmation via Instagram

steps.step_name: Confirm Interest in Vacancies Post-Travel or Delay
steps.description: Reconfirm interest in the role - If candidate previously indicated a delay, follow up to confirm ongoing interest in the vacancy and potential readiness for next steps

workflows.input: Initial candidate inquiry or ongoing candidate relationship
output: Collected candidate materials (CV/resume or video business card)
workflows.use_case: Remote recruitment, ongoing candidate relationship management
workflows.best_for: Candidates requiring multi-touch engagement, remote hiring, geographically distributed talent

workflows.objective: Engage with candidates responding to Instagram ads by confirming application details, assessing language proficiency, and requesting relevant application materials before scheduling an interview

steps.description: Verify vacancy interest - Begin conversation by greeting the candidate and confirming which specific vacancy they are interested in to ensure clarity on the role they are applying for

Inquire about language proficiency - Ask candidate about proficiency level in required language(s), provide framework for response (beginner/intermediate/advanced), ask for language certifications or experiences

steps.step_name: Request Candidate Profiles via CV or Video Business Card
steps.description: Request CV or video introduction - Ask candidate to share CV or video business card introducing themselves and summarizing professional background, provide instructions for sending via Instagram or another platform if needed
steps.format: Text request (Instagram), file delivery (Instagram or Telegram), video delivery (Instagram)

steps.description: Confirm interview availability - Once language proficiency and CV/video business card are gathered, confirm candidate interest in proceeding and request availability for virtual interview

workflows.input: Candidate response to Instagram recruitment advertisement
output: Collected application materials (CV or video business card)
workflows.use_case: Initial candidate screening from social media advertising campaigns
workflows.best_for: High-volume candidate screening, Instagram ad campaigns, quick qualification
workflows.integration_pattern: Instagram ad campaign → DM response → Screening (WF-REC-002) → Interview → Ongoing engagement (WF-REC-001 if needed)
